scripts.download: npm run download_usgs && npm run download_osm
scripts.download_usgs: npm run download_usgs_nwis && npm run download_usgs_cameras
scripts.download_usgs_nwis: npm run download_usgs_nwis_all && npm run download_usgs_nwis_current
scripts.refresh: npm run refresh_osm && npm run refresh_usgs
scripts.refresh_usgs: npm run download_usgs && npm run format_usgs
